hey people welcome to the Run testers

3 the latest Incarnation the ax no blast

Max midsole aims to help the no blast 5

4 has it finally nailed the versatility

the gusted tongues are virtually

2 quick word onfit then and the one

the ax no blast 4 was my favorite

segments.text: hey people welcome to the Run testers
now the ax Nova blast is one of those
shoes that changes tack each generation
it kind of shuffles from being softer

responsive the aex Nova blast 4 was

faster Pace potential over the novablast
3 the latest Incarnation the ax no blast
5 here now goes back to soft with the

Max midsole aims to help the no blast 5

4 has it finally nailed the versatility

the gusted tongues are virtually
